Getting started

In this example we will build a simple Hello World! page.

Prerequests

Teach is written in NodeJS. Make sure to install it before you proceed.

We use Git later to download Teach.

Installation

Download from github: 

git clone https://github.com/foldik/teach.git

Install npm dependencies and link the package: 

cd teach

npm install

npm link

Now you can use the teach command.

Hello World!

1. Initialize a new project. 

teach init hello-world && cd hello-world

2. Build the project. 

teach build

3. Show your website. 

npm install http-server -g 
http-server ./dist
You did it! Open http://localhost:8080 in the browser!
